title: Levy Mwanawasa Medical University (Declaration) Order, 2018
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 509
Gazette dated Thursday, 24th May, 2018
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.39 OF2018
The Higher Education Act
(ActNo.4of 2013)
The Levy Mwanawasa Medical University
(Declaration) Order, 2018
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection14oftheHigher
EducationAct,2013thefollowingOrderismade:
1. ThisOrdermaybecitedastheLevyMwanawasaMedical Title
University(Declaration)Order,2018.
2. The Levy Mwanawasa Medical General Hospital and Declaration
National Health Training Institute are declared the Levy of Levy
Mwanawasa
MwanawasaMedicalUniversity. Medical
University
PROF. N. LUO,
LUSAKA Minister of Higher Education
22ndMay,2018
[MOHE.101/9/1]
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
510 StatutoryInstruments 24thMay,2018
